page.title: 19General Information.
page.content: Housing - Only house built in 'planning' envelope in village, little new housing at all. Fair amount of council houses plus restored old houses. Information Sytems. Small permanant library in Mission Hall. Belchamp Walter. Travelling Library also in village monthly. Law & Order. Little problem with law and order except petty crime and some robberies in 'Weekenders' houses. People generally law abiding citizens. Language. Area on Essex/Suffolk border so dialect a mixture of both accents plus London overspill & BBC. English for many people new to villages, who generally find the local accent quaint.
